weloveclouds.server.api.v2

Interface IKVCommunicationApiV2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommunicationApi, IKVCommunicationApi, IKVServerApi
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KVCommunicationApiV2

    public interface IKVCommunicationApiV2
extends IKVCommunicationApi
    Second-generation IKVCommunicationApi which is capable of retrieving the connection information to the most recent connection, and it can decide which server to send the request to based on the RingMetadata information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerConnectionInfo getServerConnectionInfo() 
      void setRingMetadata(RingMetadata metadata)
      Save the most recent metadata information about which server handles which hash ranges, in order to decide which key shall be forwarded to which server.

      • Methods inherited from interface weloveclouds.server.api.IKVServerApi

        connect, disconnect, get, put

      • Methods inherited from interface weloveclouds.communication.api.ICommunicationApi

        connectTo, disconnect, getVersion, isConnected, receive, send, sendAndExpectForResponse

    • Method Detail

      • getServerConnectionInfo

        ServerConnectionInfo getServerConnectionInfo()
        Returns:
        the most recent connection information

      • setRingMetadata

        void setRingMetadata(RingMetadata metadata)
        Save the most recent metadata information about which server handles which hash ranges, in order to decide which key shall be forwarded to which server.
